entry.title: msfrisbie/spy-extension
entry.summary:
A Chrome extension that will steal literally everything it can

Spy Extension

This Chrome extension will steal literally everything it can. User discretion advised.

Read about it here: https://mattfrisbie.substack.com/p/spy-chrome-extension

Build from source

  • Clone the repo
  • Install dependencies with yarn
  • Run yarn start
  • Load the dist/ directory to your browser

entry.title: rainbow-me/rainbowkit
entry.summary:
The best way to connect a wallet ðŸŒˆ ðŸ§°

RainbowKit

The best way to connect a wallet ðŸŒˆ

RainbowKit is a React library that makes it easy to add wallet connection to your dapp.

  • ðŸ”¥ Out-of-the-box wallet management
  • âœ… Easily customizable
  • ðŸ¦„ Built on top of wagmi and ethers

Quick start

You can scaffold a new RainbowKit + wagmi + Next.js app with one of the following commands, using your package manager of choice:

npm init @rainbow-me/rainbowkit@latest
# or
pnpm create @rainbow-me/rainbowkit@latest
# or
yarn create @rainbow-me/rainbowkit

Documentation

For full documentation, visit rainbowkit.com.

Try it out

You can use the CodeSandbox links below try out RainbowKit:

  • with Create React App
  • with Create React App (TypeScript)
  • with Next.js

Examples

The following examples are provided in the examples folder of this repo.

  • with-create-react-app
  • with-next
  • with-next-custom-button
  • with-next-mint-nft
  • with-next-siwe-next-auth
  • with-next-siwe-iron-session
  • with-remix

Running examples

To run an example locally, install dependencies.

pnpm install

Then go into an example directory, eg: with-next.

cd examples/with-next

Then run the dev script.

pnpm run dev

Contributing

Please follow our contributing guidelines.

License

Licensed under the MIT License, Copyright Â© 2022-present Rainbow.

See LICENSE for more information.

entry.title: dabit3/gpt-travel-advisor
entry.summary:
Create a travel itinerary for any city in the world in just a few seconds

GPT Travel advisor

Requirements

Get API Key here

Configure API key in .env.local (see .example.env.local):

GPT_API_KEY=open-ai-api-GPT_API_KEY

To run the app

  1. Clone the repo
git clone git@github.com:dabit3/gpt-travel-advisor.git
  1. Install the dependencies
npm install

# or yarn, pnpm, etc...
  1. Run the app
npm run dev
